main event: A couple observed a large, luminous red aircraft in Mankato, Kansas, at dawn on January 4, 1953.
interesting points: The object appeared to be stationary above the horizon when first spotted., The aircraft had a white lighted aerial extending from the cockpit., The wife was preparing to take a photograph but the aircraft disappeared before she could do so., The sighting occurred while the couple was driving on Highway 36., The entire event lasted for several minutes before the object vanished.
witness description: a couple traveling in a vehicle
